51 #ifdef MPI
52 
53  //double complex dam_pr = 0;
54  // MPI_Status statusMPI;
55 
56  // int ierr;
57  // int INFO;
58  char TRANSA, TRANSB;
59  int M, N, K, LDA, LDB, LDC;
60  double complex ALPHA, BETA;
61  long unsigned int i_max;
62  long unsigned int j, k, ell, iloop;
63  long unsigned int i1, i2;
64  long unsigned int iomp;
65  long unsigned int ell4, ell5, ell6, m0, Ipart1;
66  long unsigned int mi, mj, mri, mrj, mrk, mrl;
67  int indj;
68  long unsigned int ellrl, ellrk, ellrj, ellri, elli1, elli2, ellj1, ellj2;
69  long unsigned int iSS1, iSS2, iSSL1, iSSL2;
70  double complex **vecJ;
71  double complex **matJ, **matJ2;
72  double complex *matJL;
73  double complex *matI;
74  double complex **matB;
75  double complex *arrayz;
76  double complex *arrayx;
77  double complex *arrayw;
78  long unsigned int ishift1, ishift2, ishift3, ishift4, ishift5, pivot_flag, num_J_star;
79  long unsigned int pow4, pow5, pow41, pow51;
80  //long unsigned int pow1, pow2, pow3, pow4, pow5, pow11, pow21, pow31, pow41, pow51;
81 
82  i_max = X->Check.idim_max;
83 
84 /*
85 //zero clear
86  #pragma omp parallel for default(none) private(j) \
87  shared(i_max,tmp_v0)
88  for(j=0;j<i_max;j++){
89  tmp_v0[j+1]=0.0;
90  }
91 */
92 
93  c_malloc2(vecJ, 3, 3);
94  c_malloc2(matJ, 4, 4);
95  c_malloc2(matJ2, 4, 4);
96  c_malloc2(matB, 2, 2);
97  c_malloc1(matJL, (64*64));
98  c_malloc1(matI, (64*64));
99 
100 // c_malloc1(arrayx, (64*((int)pow(2.0, 16))));
101 // c_malloc1(arrayz, (64*((int)pow(2.0, 16))));
102 // c_malloc1(arrayw, (64*((int)pow(2.0, 16))));
103 
104  //defmodelBoost(X->Boost.W0, X->Boost.R0, X->Boost.num_pivot, X->Boost.ishift_nspin, X->Boost.list_6spin_star, X->Boost.list_6spin_pair, 1, X->Boost.arrayJ, X->Boost.vecB);
105 
106  for(iloop=0; iloop < X->Boost.R0; iloop++){
107 
108 
109  for(j=iloop*X->Boost.num_pivot; j < (iloop+1)*X->Boost.num_pivot; j++){
110 
111  num_J_star = (long unsigned int)X->Boost.list_6spin_star[j][0]; //(0,j)
112  ishift1 = (long unsigned int)X->Boost.list_6spin_star[j][1]; //(1,j)
113  ishift2 = (long unsigned int)X->Boost.list_6spin_star[j][2]; //(2,j)
114  ishift3 = (long unsigned int)X->Boost.list_6spin_star[j][3]; //(3,j)
115  ishift4 = (long unsigned int)X->Boost.list_6spin_star[j][4]; //(4,j)
116  ishift5 = (long unsigned int)X->Boost.list_6spin_star[j][5]; //(5,j)
117  pivot_flag = (long unsigned int)X->Boost.list_6spin_star[j][6]; //(6,j)
118  //pow1 = (int)pow(2.0,ishift1);
119  //pow2 = (int)pow(2.0,ishift1+ishift2);
120  //pow3 = (int)pow(2.0,ishift1+ishift2+ishift3);
121  pow4 = (int)pow(2.0,ishift1+ishift2+ishift3+ishift4);
122  pow5 = (int)pow(2.0,ishift1+ishift2+ishift3+ishift4+ishift5);
123  //pow11= (int)pow(2.0,ishift1+1);
124  //pow21= (int)pow(2.0,ishift1+ishift2+1);
125  //pow31= (int)pow(2.0,ishift1+ishift2+ishift3+1);
126  pow41= (int)pow(2.0,ishift1+ishift2+ishift3+ishift4+1);
127  pow51= (int)pow(2.0,ishift1+ishift2+ishift3+ishift4+ishift5+1);
128 
129  for(k=0; k < (64*64); k++){
130  matJL[k] = 0.0 + 0.0*I;
131  matI[k] = 0.0 + 0.0*I;
132  }
133  for(k=0; k < 64; k++){
134  matI[k+64*k] = 1.0;
135  }
136 
137  for(ell=0; ell < num_J_star; ell++){
138  mi = (long unsigned int)X->Boost.list_6spin_pair[j][0][ell]; //(1,ell,j)
139  mj = (long unsigned int)X->Boost.list_6spin_pair[j][1][ell]; //(2,ell,j)
140  mri = (long unsigned int)X->Boost.list_6spin_pair[j][2][ell]; //(3,ell,j)
141  mrj = (long unsigned int)X->Boost.list_6spin_pair[j][3][ell]; //(4,ell,j)
142  mrk = (long unsigned int)X->Boost.list_6spin_pair[j][4][ell]; //(5,ell,j)
143  mrl = (long unsigned int)X->Boost.list_6spin_pair[j][5][ell]; //(6,ell,j)
144  indj = X->Boost.list_6spin_pair[j][6][ell]; //(7,ell,j)
145  for(i1 = 0; i1 < 3; i1++){
146  for(i2 = 0; i2 < 3; i2++){
147  vecJ[i1][i2] = X->Boost.arrayJ[(indj-1)][i1][i2];
148  }
149  }
150  //matJSS(1,1) = vecJ(3,3)
151  matJ[0][0] = vecJ[2][2];
152  //matJSS(1,2)= vecJ(1,1)-vecJ(2,2)-dcmplx(0.0d0,1.0d0)*vecJ(1,2)-dcmplx(0.0d0,1.0d0)*vecJ(2,1)
153  matJ[0][1] = vecJ[0][0]-vecJ[1][1]-I*vecJ[0][1]-I*vecJ[1][0];
154  //matJSS(1,3)= vecJ(3,1)-dcmplx(0.0d0,1.0d0)*vecJ(3,2)
155  matJ[0][2] = vecJ[2][0]-I*vecJ[2][1];
156  //matJSS(1,4)= vecJ(1,3)-dcmplx(0.0d0,1.0d0)*vecJ(2,3)
157  matJ[0][3] = vecJ[0][2]-I*vecJ[1][2];
158  //matJSS(2,1)= vecJ(1,1)-vecJ(2,2)+dcmplx(0.0d0,1.0d0)*vecJ(1,2)+dcmplx(0.0d0,1.0d0)*vecJ(2,1)
159  matJ[1][0] = vecJ[0][0]-vecJ[1][1]+I*vecJ[0][1]+I*vecJ[1][0];
160  //matJSS(2,2)= vecJ(3,3)
161  matJ[1][1] = vecJ[2][2];
162  //matJSS(2,3)=dcmplx(-1.0d0,0.0d0)*vecJ(1,3)-dcmplx(0.0d0,1.0d0)*vecJ(2,3)
163  matJ[1][2] =(-1.0)*vecJ[0][2]-I*vecJ[1][2];
164  //matJSS(2,4)=dcmplx(-1.0d0,0.0d0)*vecJ(3,1)-dcmplx(0.0d0,1.0d0)*vecJ(3,2)
165  matJ[1][3] =(-1.0)*vecJ[2][0]-I*vecJ[2][1];
166  //matJSS(3,1)= vecJ(3,1)+dcmplx(0.0d0,1.0d0)*vecJ(3,2)
167  matJ[2][0] = vecJ[2][0]+I*vecJ[2][1];
168  //matJSS(3,2)=dcmplx(-1.0d0,0.0d0)*vecJ(1,3)+dcmplx(0.0d0,1.0d0)*vecJ(2,3)
169  matJ[2][1] =(-1.0)*vecJ[0][2]+I*vecJ[1][2];
170  //matJSS(3,3)=dcmplx(-1.0d0,0.0d0)*vecJ(3,3)
171  matJ[2][2] =(-1.0)*vecJ[2][2];
172  //matJSS(3,4)= vecJ(1,1)+vecJ(2,2)+dcmplx(0.0d0,1.0d0)*vecJ(1,2)-dcmplx(0.0d0,1.0d0)*vecJ(2,1)
173  matJ[2][3] = vecJ[0][0]+vecJ[1][1]+I*vecJ[0][1]-I*vecJ[1][0];
174  //matJSS(4,1)= vecJ(1,3)+dcmplx(0.0d0,1.0d0)*vecJ(2,3)
175  matJ[3][0] = vecJ[0][2]+I*vecJ[1][2];
176  //matJSS(4,2)=dcmplx(-1.0d0,0.0d0)*vecJ(3,1)+dcmplx(0.0d0,1.0d0)*vecJ(3,2)
177  matJ[3][1] =(-1.0)*vecJ[2][0]+I*vecJ[2][1];
178  //matJSS(4,3)= vecJ(1,1)+vecJ(2,2)-dcmplx(0.0d0,1.0d0)*vecJ(1,2)+dcmplx(0.0d0,1.0d0)*vecJ(2,1)
179  matJ[3][2] = vecJ[0][0]+vecJ[1][1]-I*vecJ[0][1]+I*vecJ[1][0];
180  //matJSS(4,4)=dcmplx(-1.0d0,0.0d0)*vecJ(3,3)
181  matJ[3][3] =(-1.0)*vecJ[2][2];
182 
183  matJ2[3][3] = matJ[0][0];
184  matJ2[3][0] = matJ[0][1];
185  matJ2[3][1] = matJ[0][2];
186  matJ2[3][2] = matJ[0][3];
187  matJ2[0][3] = matJ[1][0];
188  matJ2[0][0] = matJ[1][1];
189  matJ2[0][1] = matJ[1][2];
190  matJ2[0][2] = matJ[1][3];
191  matJ2[1][3] = matJ[2][0];
192  matJ2[1][0] = matJ[2][1];
193  matJ2[1][1] = matJ[2][2];
194  matJ2[1][2] = matJ[2][3];
195  matJ2[2][3] = matJ[3][0];
196  matJ2[2][0] = matJ[3][1];
197  matJ2[2][1] = matJ[3][2];
198  matJ2[2][2] = matJ[3][3];
199 
200  for(ellri=0; ellri<2; ellri++){
201  for(ellrj=0; ellrj<2; ellrj++){
202  for(ellrk=0; ellrk<2; ellrk++){
203  for(ellrl=0; ellrl<2; ellrl++){
204  for(elli1=0; elli1<2; elli1++){
205  for(ellj1=0; ellj1<2; ellj1++){
206  for(elli2=0; elli2<2; elli2++){
207  for(ellj2=0; ellj2<2; ellj2++){
208 
209  iSSL1 = elli1*(int)pow(2,mi) + ellj1*(int)pow(2,mj) + ellri*(int)pow(2,mri) + ellrj*(int)pow(2,mrj) + ellrk*(int)pow(2,mrk) + ellrl*(int)pow(2,mrl);
210  iSSL2 = elli2*(int)pow(2,mi) + ellj2*(int)pow(2,mj) + ellri*(int)pow(2,mri) + ellrj*(int)pow(2,mrj) + ellrk*(int)pow(2,mrk) + ellrl*(int)pow(2,mrl);
211  iSS1 = elli1 + 2*ellj1;
212  iSS2 = elli2 + 2*ellj2;
213  matJL[iSSL1+64*iSSL2] += matJ2[iSS1][iSS2];
214  }
215  }
216  }
217  }
218  }
219  }
220  }
221  }
222 
223 
224  }/* loop for ell */
225 
226  /* external magnetic field B */
227  if(pivot_flag==1){
228  matB[0][0] = + X->Boost.vecB[2]; // -BM
229  matB[1][1] = - X->Boost.vecB[2]; // -BM
230  matB[0][1] = - X->Boost.vecB[0] + I*X->Boost.vecB[1]; // -BM
231  matB[1][0] = - X->Boost.vecB[0] - I*X->Boost.vecB[1]; // -BM
232  for(ellri=0; ellri<2; ellri++){
233  for(ellrj=0; ellrj<2; ellrj++){
234  for(ellrk=0; ellrk<2; ellrk++){
235  for(ellrl=0; ellrl<2; ellrl++){
236  for(ellj1=0; ellj1<2; ellj1++){
237  for(elli1=0; elli1<2; elli1++){
238  for(elli2=0; elli2<2; elli2++){
239  for(ellj2=0; ellj2<X->Boost.ishift_nspin; ellj2++){
240  iSSL1 = elli1*(int)pow(2,ellj2) + ellj1*(int)pow(2,((ellj2+1)%6)) + ellri*(int)pow(2,((ellj2+2)%6)) + ellrj*(int)pow(2,((ellj2+3)%6)) + ellrk*(int)pow(2,((ellj2+4)%6)) + ellrl*(int)pow(2,((ellj2+5)%6));
241  iSSL2 = elli2*(int)pow(2,ellj2) + ellj1*(int)pow(2,((ellj2+1)%6)) + ellri*(int)pow(2,((ellj2+2)%6)) + ellrj*(int)pow(2,((ellj2+3)%6)) + ellrk*(int)pow(2,((ellj2+4)%6)) + ellrl*(int)pow(2,((ellj2+5)%6));
242  matJL[iSSL1+64*iSSL2] += matB[elli1][elli2];
243  }
244  }
245  }
246  }
247  }
248  }
249  }
250  }
251  }
252  /* external magnetic field B */
253 
254  iomp=i_max/(int)pow(2.0,ishift1+ishift2+ishift3+ishift4+ishift5+2);
255 
256  #pragma omp parallel default(none) private(arrayx,arrayz,arrayw,ell4,ell5,ell6,m0,Ipart1,TRANSA,TRANSB,M,N,K,LDA,LDB,LDC,ALPHA,BETA) \
257  shared(matJL,matI,iomp,i_max,myrank,ishift1,ishift2,ishift3,ishift4,ishift5,pow4,pow5,pow41,pow51,tmp_v0,tmp_v1,tmp_v3)
258  {
259 
260  c_malloc1(arrayx, (64*((int)pow(2.0,ishift4+ishift5-1))));
261  c_malloc1(arrayz, (64*((int)pow(2.0,ishift4+ishift5-1))));
262  c_malloc1(arrayw, (64*((int)pow(2.0,ishift4+ishift5-1))));
263 
264 #pragma omp for
265  for(ell6 = 0; ell6 < iomp; ell6++){
266  Ipart1=pow51*2*ell6;
267  for(ell5 = 0; ell5 < (int)pow(2.0, ishift5-1); ell5++){
268  for(ell4 = 0; ell4 < (int)pow(2.0, ishift4-1); ell4++){
269  for(m0 = 0; m0 < 16; m0++){
270  arrayz[(0 + m0 +64*(ell4+ell5*(int)pow(2.0,ishift4-1)))] = tmp_v1[(1 + m0+16*ell4 +pow41*ell5+Ipart1)];
271  arrayz[(16+ m0 +64*(ell4+ell5*(int)pow(2.0,ishift4-1)))] = tmp_v1[(1 + m0+16*ell4+pow4 +pow41*ell5+Ipart1)];
272  arrayz[(32+ m0 +64*(ell4+ell5*(int)pow(2.0,ishift4-1)))] = tmp_v1[(1 + m0+16*ell4+pow5 +pow41*ell5+Ipart1)];
273  arrayz[(48+ m0 +64*(ell4+ell5*(int)pow(2.0,ishift4-1)))] = tmp_v1[(1 + m0+16*ell4+pow4+pow5+pow41*ell5+Ipart1)];
274  tmp_v3[(1 + m0+16*ell4 +pow41*ell5+Ipart1)]=tmp_v1[(1 + m0+16*ell4 +pow41*ell5+Ipart1)];
275  tmp_v3[(1 + m0+16*ell4+pow4 +pow41*ell5+Ipart1)]=tmp_v1[(1 + m0+16*ell4+pow4 +pow41*ell5+Ipart1)];
276  tmp_v3[(1 + m0+16*ell4+pow5 +pow41*ell5+Ipart1)]=tmp_v1[(1 + m0+16*ell4+pow5 +pow41*ell5+Ipart1)];
277  tmp_v3[(1 + m0+16*ell4+pow4+pow5+pow41*ell5+Ipart1)]=tmp_v1[(1 + m0+16*ell4+pow4+pow5+pow41*ell5+Ipart1)];
278  arrayx[(0 + m0 +64*(ell4+ell5*(int)pow(2.0,ishift4-1)))] = tmp_v0[(1 + m0+16*ell4 +pow41*ell5+Ipart1)];
279  arrayx[(16+ m0 +64*(ell4+ell5*(int)pow(2.0,ishift4-1)))] = tmp_v0[(1 + m0+16*ell4+pow4 +pow41*ell5+Ipart1)];
280  arrayx[(32+ m0 +64*(ell4+ell5*(int)pow(2.0,ishift4-1)))] = tmp_v0[(1 + m0+16*ell4+pow5 +pow41*ell5+Ipart1)];
281  arrayx[(48+ m0 +64*(ell4+ell5*(int)pow(2.0,ishift4-1)))] = tmp_v0[(1 + m0+16*ell4+pow4+pow5+pow41*ell5+Ipart1)];
282  }
283  }
284  }
285 
286 
287  for(ell5 = 0; ell5 < (int)pow(2.0, ishift5-1); ell5++){
288  for(ell4 = 0; ell4 < (int)pow(2.0, ishift4-1); ell4++){
289  for(m0 = 0; m0 < 16; m0++){
290  arrayz[(0 + m0+64*(ell4+ell5*(int)pow(2.0,ishift4-1)+(int)pow(2.0,ishift4+ishift5-2)))] = tmp_v1[(1 + m0+16*ell4 +pow41*ell5+pow51+Ipart1)];
291  arrayz[(16+ m0+64*(ell4+ell5*(int)pow(2.0,ishift4-1)+(int)pow(2.0,ishift4+ishift5-2)))] = tmp_v1[(1 + m0+16*ell4+pow4 +pow41*ell5+pow51+Ipart1)];
292  arrayz[(32+ m0+64*(ell4+ell5*(int)pow(2.0,ishift4-1)+(int)pow(2.0,ishift4+ishift5-2)))] = tmp_v1[(1 + m0+16*ell4+pow5 +pow41*ell5+pow51+Ipart1)];
293  arrayz[(48+ m0+64*(ell4+ell5*(int)pow(2.0,ishift4-1)+(int)pow(2.0,ishift4+ishift5-2)))] = tmp_v1[(1 + m0+16*ell4+pow4+pow5+pow41*ell5+pow51+Ipart1)];
294  tmp_v3[(1 + m0+16*ell4 +pow41*ell5+pow51+Ipart1)] = tmp_v1[(1 + m0+16*ell4 +pow41*ell5+pow51+Ipart1)];
295  tmp_v3[(1 + m0+16*ell4+pow4 +pow41*ell5+pow51+Ipart1)] = tmp_v1[(1 + m0+16*ell4+pow4 +pow41*ell5+pow51+Ipart1)];
296  tmp_v3[(1 + m0+16*ell4+pow5 +pow41*ell5+pow51+Ipart1)] = tmp_v1[(1 + m0+16*ell4+pow5 +pow41*ell5+pow51+Ipart1)];
297  tmp_v3[(1 + m0+16*ell4+pow4+pow5+pow41*ell5+pow51+Ipart1)] = tmp_v1[(1 + m0+16*ell4+pow4+pow5+pow41*ell5+pow51+Ipart1)];
298  arrayx[(0 + m0+64*(ell4+ell5*(int)pow(2.0,ishift4-1)+(int)pow(2.0,ishift4+ishift5-2)))] = tmp_v0[(1 + m0+16*ell4 +pow41*ell5+pow51+Ipart1)];
299  arrayx[(16+ m0+64*(ell4+ell5*(int)pow(2.0,ishift4-1)+(int)pow(2.0,ishift4+ishift5-2)))] = tmp_v0[(1 + m0+16*ell4+pow4 +pow41*ell5+pow51+Ipart1)];
300  arrayx[(32+ m0+64*(ell4+ell5*(int)pow(2.0,ishift4-1)+(int)pow(2.0,ishift4+ishift5-2)))] = tmp_v0[(1 + m0+16*ell4+pow5 +pow41*ell5+pow51+Ipart1)];
301  arrayx[(48+ m0+64*(ell4+ell5*(int)pow(2.0,ishift4-1)+(int)pow(2.0,ishift4+ishift5-2)))] = tmp_v0[(1 + m0+16*ell4+pow4+pow5+pow41*ell5+pow51+Ipart1)];
302  }
303 
304  }
305  }
306 
307  TRANSA = 'N';
308  TRANSB = 'N';
309  M = 64;
310  N = (int)pow(2.0, ishift4+ishift5-1);
311  K = 64;
312  ALPHA = 1.0;
313  LDA = 64;
314  LDB = 64;
315  BETA = 1.0;
316  LDC = 64;
317 
318  zgemm_(&TRANSA,&TRANSB,&M,&N,&K,&ALPHA,matJL,&LDA,arrayz,&LDB,&BETA,arrayx,&LDC);
319  //zgemm_(&TRANSA,&TRANSB,&M,&N,&K,&ALPHA,matI,&LDA,arrayz,&LDB,&BETA,arrayx,&LDC);
320 /*
321  for(ell5=0;ell5<(64*N);ell5++){
322  arrayw[ell5]=0.0;
323  }
324  for(ell5=0;ell5<64;ell5++){
325  for(ell4=0;ell4<64;ell4++){
326  for(m0=0;m0<N;m0++){
327  arrayw[(ell5+64*m0)] += matJL[(ell5+64*ell4)]*arrayz[(ell4+64*m0)];
328  }
329  }
330  }
331  for(ell5=0;ell5<64*N;ell5++){
332  arrayx[ell5] += arrayw[ell5];
333  }
334 */
335 
336 
337 
338  for(ell5 = 0; ell5 < (int)pow(2.0,ishift5-1); ell5++){
339  for(ell4 = 0; ell4 < (int)pow(2.0,ishift4-1); ell4++){
340  for(m0 = 0; m0 < 16; m0++){
341  tmp_v1[(1 + m0+16*ell4 +pow41*ell5+Ipart1)] = arrayx[(0 + m0+64*(ell4+ell5*(int)pow(2.0,ishift4-1)))];
342  tmp_v1[(1 + m0+16*ell4+pow4 +pow41*ell5+Ipart1)] = arrayx[(16+ m0+64*(ell4+ell5*(int)pow(2.0,ishift4-1)))];
343  tmp_v1[(1 + m0+16*ell4+pow5 +pow41*ell5+Ipart1)] = arrayx[(32+ m0+64*(ell4+ell5*(int)pow(2.0,ishift4-1)))];
344  tmp_v1[(1 + m0+16*ell4+pow4+pow5+pow41*ell5+Ipart1)] = arrayx[(48+ m0+64*(ell4+ell5*(int)pow(2.0,ishift4-1)))];
345  }
346  }
347  }
348  for(ell5 = 0; ell5 < (int)pow(2.0,ishift5-1); ell5++){
349  for(ell4 = 0; ell4 < (int)pow(2.0,ishift4-1); ell4++){
350  for(m0 = 0; m0 < 16; m0++){
351  tmp_v1[(1 + m0+16*ell4 +pow41*ell5+pow51+Ipart1)] = arrayx[(0 + m0+64*(ell4+ell5*(int)pow(2.0,ishift4-1)+(int)pow(2.0,ishift4+ishift5-2)))];
352  tmp_v1[(1 + m0+16*ell4+pow4 +pow41*ell5+pow51+Ipart1)] = arrayx[(16+ m0+64*(ell4+ell5*(int)pow(2.0,ishift4-1)+(int)pow(2.0,ishift4+ishift5-2)))];
353  tmp_v1[(1 + m0+16*ell4+pow5 +pow41*ell5+pow51+Ipart1)] = arrayx[(32+ m0+64*(ell4+ell5*(int)pow(2.0,ishift4-1)+(int)pow(2.0,ishift4+ishift5-2)))];
354  tmp_v1[(1 + m0+16*ell4+pow4+pow5+pow41*ell5+pow51+Ipart1)] = arrayx[(48+ m0+64*(ell4+ell5*(int)pow(2.0,ishift4-1)+(int)pow(2.0,ishift4+ishift5-2)))];
355  }
356  }
357  }
358 
359  }/* omp parallel for */
360  c_free1(arrayz, (64*((int)pow(2.0,ishift4+ishift5-1))) );
361  c_free1(arrayx, (64*((int)pow(2.0,ishift4+ishift5-1))) );
362  c_free1(arrayw, (64*((int)pow(2.0,ishift4+ishift5-1))) );
363 
364  }/* omp parallel */
365 
366  if(pivot_flag==1){
367  iomp=i_max/(int)pow(2.0,X->Boost.ishift_nspin);
368  #pragma omp parallel for default(none) private(ell4,ell5,ell6,m0,Ipart1,TRANSA,TRANSB,M,N,K,LDA,LDB,LDC,ALPHA,BETA) \
369  firstprivate(iomp) shared(i_max,ishift1,ishift2,ishift3,ishift4,ishift5,pow4,pow5,pow41,pow51,X,tmp_v0,tmp_v1)
370  for(ell5 = 0; ell5 < iomp; ell5++ ){
371  for(ell4 = 0; ell4 < (int)pow(2.0,X->Boost.ishift_nspin); ell4++){
372  tmp_v0[(1 + ell5+(i_max/(int)pow(2.0,X->Boost.ishift_nspin))*ell4)] = tmp_v1[(1 + ell4+((int)pow(2.0,X->Boost.ishift_nspin))*ell5)];
373  }
374  }
375  iomp=i_max/(int)pow(2.0,X->Boost.ishift_nspin);
376  #pragma omp parallel for default(none) private(ell4,ell5) \
377  firstprivate(iomp) shared(i_max,X,tmp_v1,tmp_v3)
378  for(ell5 = 0; ell5 < iomp; ell5++ ){
379  for(ell4 = 0; ell4 < (int)pow(2.0,X->Boost.ishift_nspin); ell4++){
380  tmp_v1[(1 + ell5+(i_max/(int)pow(2.0,X->Boost.ishift_nspin))*ell4)] = tmp_v3[(1 + ell4+((int)pow(2.0,X->Boost.ishift_nspin))*ell5)];
381  }
382  }
383  }
384  else{
385  #pragma omp parallel for default(none) private(ell4) \
386  shared(i_max,tmp_v0,tmp_v1,tmp_v3)
387  for(ell4 = 0; ell4 < i_max; ell4++ ){
388  tmp_v0[1 + ell4] = tmp_v1[1 + ell4];
389  tmp_v1[1 + ell4] = tmp_v3[1 + ell4];
390  }
391  }/* if pivot_flag */
392 
393  }/* loop for j */
394 
395  /*
396  ierr = MPI_Alltoall(&tmp_v1[1],(int)(i_max/nproc),MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX,&tmp_v3[1],(int)(i_max/nproc),MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX,MPI_COMM_WORLD);
397  ierr = MPI_Alltoall(&tmp_v0[1],(int)(i_max/nproc),MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX,&tmp_v2[1],(int)(i_max/nproc),MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX,MPI_COMM_WORLD);
398  */
399  MPI_Alltoall(&tmp_v1[1],(int)(i_max/nproc),MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX,&tmp_v3[1],(int)(i_max/nproc),MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX,MPI_COMM_WORLD);
400  MPI_Alltoall(&tmp_v0[1],(int)(i_max/nproc),MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX,&tmp_v2[1],(int)(i_max/nproc),MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX,MPI_COMM_WORLD);
401 
402 
403  iomp=(int)pow(2.0,X->Boost.W0)/nproc;
404  #pragma omp parallel for default(none) private(ell4,ell5,ell6) \
405  firstprivate(iomp) shared(i_max,X,nproc,tmp_v0,tmp_v1,tmp_v2,tmp_v3)
406  //for(ell4 = 0; ell4 < (int)pow(2.0,X->Boost.W0)/nproc; ell4++ ){
407  for(ell4 = 0; ell4 < iomp; ell4++ ){
408  for(ell5 = 0; ell5 < nproc; ell5++ ){
409  for(ell6 = 0; ell6 < (int)(i_max/(int)pow(2.0,X->Boost.W0)); ell6++ ){
410  tmp_v1[(1 + ell6+ell5*i_max/(int)pow(2.0,X->Boost.W0)+ell4*i_max/((int)pow(2.0,X->Boost.W0)/nproc))] = tmp_v3[(1 + ell6+ell4*i_max/(int)pow(2.0,X->Boost.W0)+ell5*i_max/nproc)];
411  tmp_v0[(1 + ell6+ell5*i_max/(int)pow(2.0,X->Boost.W0)+ell4*i_max/((int)pow(2.0,X->Boost.W0)/nproc))] = tmp_v2[(1 + ell6+ell4*i_max/(int)pow(2.0,X->Boost.W0)+ell5*i_max/nproc)];
412  }
413  }
414  }
415 
416 
417  }/* loop for iloop */
418 
419 /*
420  dam_pr= X_child_general_int_spin_MPIBoost
421  (
422  matJ, X, tmp_v0, tmp_v1);
423 
424  X->Large.prdct += dam_pr;
425 */
426 // c_free1(arrayz, (int)pow(2.0, 16));
427 // c_free1(arrayx, (int)pow(2.0, 16));
428 // c_free1(arrayw, (int)pow(2.0, 16));
429 
430  c_free2(vecJ, 3, 3);
431  c_free2(matJ, 4, 4);
432  c_free2(matJ2, 4, 4);
433  c_free2(matB, 2, 2);
434  c_free1(matJL, (64*64));
435  c_free1(matI, (64*64));
436 
437 #endif
438 
439 }/*void child_general_int_spin_MPIBoost*/

3699  if (iCheck == TRUE) {

3702  tmp_isite3 = X->Def.OrgTpow[2 * org_isite2 + org_ispin2];

3705  iFlgHermite = TRUE;
3706  if (X->Large.mode == M_CORR) {
3707  tmp_V = 0;
3708  }
3709  }
3710  else {
3711  return 0.0;
3712  }
3713  }
3714 
3715  if (myrank == origin) {
3716  if (isite1 == isite4 && isite2 == isite3) { // CisAjvCjvAis =Cis(1-njv)Ais=nis-nisnjv
3717  //calc nis
3718  dam_pr = X_child_CisAis_Hubbard_MPI(org_isite1, org_ispin1, tmp_V, X, tmp_v0, tmp_v1);
3719  //calc -nisniv
3720  dam_pr -= X_child_CisAisCjtAjt_Hubbard_MPI(org_isite1, org_ispin1, org_isite3, org_ispin3, tmp_V, X, tmp_v0,
3721  tmp_v1);
3722  }
3723  else if (isite2 == isite3) { // CisAjvCjvAku= Cis(1-njv)Aku=-CisAkunjv+CisAku: j is in PE
3724  if (isite4 > isite1) Adiff = isite4 - isite1 * 2;
3725  else Adiff = isite1 - isite4 * 2;
3726 
3727  //calc CisAku
3728 #pragma omp parallel for default(none) reduction(+:dam_pr) private(j, tmp_off) firstprivate(i_max, tmp_V, X, isite1, isite4, Adiff) shared(tmp_v1, tmp_v0, list_1)
3729  for (j = 1; j <= i_max; j++) {
3730  dam_pr += CisAjt(j, tmp_v0, tmp_v1, X, isite1, isite4, (isite1 + isite4), Adiff, tmp_V);
3731  }
3732  //calc -CisAku njv
3733  dam_pr -= X_child_CisAjtCkuAku_Hubbard_MPI(org_isite1, org_ispin1, org_isite4, org_ispin4, org_isite2,
3734  org_ispin2, tmp_V, X, tmp_v0, tmp_v1);
3735 
3736  if (X->Large.mode != M_CORR) { //for hermite
3737 #pragma omp parallel for default(none) reduction(+:dam_pr) private(j, tmp_off) firstprivate(i_max, tmp_V, X, isite1, isite4, Adiff) shared(tmp_v1, tmp_v0)
3738  for (j = 1; j <= i_max; j++) {
3739  dam_pr += CisAjt(j, tmp_v0, tmp_v1, X, isite4, isite1, (isite1 + isite4), Adiff, tmp_V);
3740  }
3741  //calc -njvCkuAis
3742  dam_pr -= X_child_CisAisCjtAku_Hubbard_MPI(org_isite2, org_ispin2, org_isite4, org_ispin4, org_isite1,
3743  org_ispin1, tmp_V, X, tmp_v0, tmp_v1);
3744  }
3745  }
3746  else {// CisAjtCkuAis = -CisAisCkuAjt: i is in PE
3747  dam_pr = -X_child_CisAisCjtAku_Hubbard_MPI(org_isite1, org_ispin1, org_isite3, org_ispin3, org_isite2,
3748  org_ispin2, tmp_V, X, tmp_v0, tmp_v1);
3749 
3750  if (X->Large.mode != M_CORR) { //for hermite: CisAkuCjtAis=-CisAisCjtAku
3751  dam_pr = -X_child_CisAisCjtAku_Hubbard_MPI(org_isite1, org_ispin1, org_isite2, org_ispin2, org_isite3,
3752  org_ispin3, tmp_V, X, tmp_v0, tmp_v1);
3753  }
3754  }
3755 
3756  return dam_pr;
3757  }//myrank =origin
3758  else {
3759  //printf("debug: myrank=%d, origin=%d\n", myrank, origin);
3760  ierr = MPI_Sendrecv(&X->Check.idim_max, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, origin, 0,
3761  &idim_max_buf, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, origin, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &statusMPI);
3762  if (ierr != 0) exitMPI(-1);
3763 
3764  ierr = MPI_Sendrecv(list_1, X->Check.idim_max + 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, origin, 0,
3765  list_1buf, idim_max_buf + 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, origin, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &statusMPI);
3766  if (ierr != 0) exitMPI(-1);

3769  v1buf, idim_max_buf + 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, origin, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &statusMPI);
3770  if (ierr != 0) exitMPI(-1);
3771 
3772  if (org_isite1 + 1 > X->Def.Nsite && org_isite2 + 1 > X->Def.Nsite
3773  && org_isite3 + 1 > X->Def.Nsite && org_isite4 + 1 > X->Def.Nsite) {
3774 
3775  if (isite2 > isite1) Adiff = isite2 - isite1 * 2;
3776  else Adiff = isite1 - isite2 * 2;
3777  if (isite4 > isite3) Bdiff = isite4 - isite3 * 2;
3778  else Bdiff = isite3 - isite4 * 2;
3779 
3780  if (iFlgHermite == FALSE) {
3781  Fsgn = X_GC_CisAjt((long unsigned int) myrank, X, isite2, isite1, (isite1 + isite2), Adiff, &tmp_off2);
3782  Fsgn *= X_GC_CisAjt(tmp_off2, X, isite4, isite3, (isite3 + isite4), Bdiff, &tmp_off);
3783  tmp_V *= Fsgn;
3784  }
3785  else {
3786  Fsgn = X_GC_CisAjt((long unsigned int) myrank, X, isite3, isite4, (isite3 + isite4), Bdiff, &tmp_off2);
3787  Fsgn *= X_GC_CisAjt(tmp_off2, X, isite1, isite2, (isite1 + isite2), Adiff, &tmp_off);
3788  tmp_V *= Fsgn;
3789  }
3790  dam_pr = 0;
3791  if (X->Large.mode == M_MLTPLY) {
3792 #pragma omp parallel for default(none) reduction(+:dam_pr) private(j, dmv, ioff) firstprivate(idim_max_buf, tmp_V, X) shared(v1buf, tmp_v1, tmp_v0, list_2_1, list_2_2, list_1buf)
3793  for (j = 1; j <= idim_max_buf; j++) {
3794  if (GetOffComp(list_2_1, list_2_2, list_1buf[j],
3795  X->Large.irght, X->Large.ilft, X->Large.ihfbit, &ioff) == TRUE) {
3796  dmv = tmp_V * v1buf[j];
3797  tmp_v0[ioff] += dmv;
3798  dam_pr += conj(tmp_v1[ioff]) * dmv;
3799  }
3800  }
3801  }
3802  else {
3803 #pragma omp parallel for default(none) reduction(+:dam_pr) private(j, dmv, ioff) firstprivate(idim_max_buf, tmp_V, X) shared(v1buf, tmp_v1, tmp_v0, list_2_1, list_2_2, list_1buf)

3807  dmv = tmp_V * v1buf[j];

3809  }
3810  }
3811  }

3827  X->Large.irght, X->Large.ilft, X->Large.ihfbit, &ioff) == TRUE) {
3828  dmv = tmp_V * v1buf[j] * Fsgn;
3829  tmp_v0[ioff] += dmv;
3830  dam_pr += conj(tmp_v1[ioff]) * dmv;
3831 
3832  }
3833  }
3834  }
3835  }
3836  else {

3840  list_1buf[j] + org_rankbit, &tmp_off) == TRUE) {

Here is the call graph for this function:

Here is the caller graph for this function:

double complex X_child_general_hopp_MPIdouble ( int  org_isite1,
int  org_ispin1,
int  org_isite2,
int  org_ispin2,
double complex  tmp_trans,
struct BindStruct *  X,
double complex *  tmp_v0,
double complex *  tmp_v1 
)

Hopping term in Hubbard (Kondo) + Canonical ensemble When both site1 and site2 are in the inter process region.

Author
Mitsuaki Kawamura (The University of Tokyo)
Parameters
[in,out]X
[out]tmp_v0Result v0 = H v1
[in]tmp_v1v0 = H v1

Definition at line 303 of file mltplyMPI.c.

311  {
312 #ifdef MPI
313  int mask1, mask2, state1, state2, ierr, origin, bitdiff, Fsgn;
314  unsigned long int idim_max_buf, j, ioff;
315  MPI_Status statusMPI;
316  double complex trans, dmv, dam_pr;
317 
318  mask1 = (int) X->Def.Tpow[2 * org_isite1 + org_ispin1];
319  mask2 = (int) X->Def.Tpow[2 * org_isite2 + org_ispin2];
320 
321  if (mask2 > mask1) bitdiff = mask2 - mask1 * 2;
322  else bitdiff = mask1 - mask2 * 2;
323  origin = myrank ^ (mask1 + mask2);
324 
325  state1 = origin & mask1;
326  state2 = origin & mask2;
327 
328  SgnBit((unsigned long int) (origin & bitdiff), &Fsgn); // Fermion sign
329 
330  if (state1 == 0 && state2 == mask2) {
331  trans = -(double) Fsgn * tmp_trans;
332  }
333  else if (state1 == mask1 && state2 == 0) {
334  trans = -(double) Fsgn * conj(tmp_trans);
335  if (X->Large.mode == M_CORR) {
336  trans = 0;
337  }
338  }
339  else return 0;
340 
341  ierr = MPI_Sendrecv(&X->Check.idim_max, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, origin, 0,
342  &idim_max_buf, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, origin, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &statusMPI);
343  if (ierr != 0) exitMPI(-1);
344  ierr = MPI_Sendrecv(list_1, X->Check.idim_max + 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, origin, 0,
345  list_1buf, idim_max_buf + 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, origin, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &statusMPI);
346  if (ierr != 0) exitMPI(-1);
347  ierr = MPI_Sendrecv(tmp_v1, X->Check.idim_max + 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, origin, 0,
348  v1buf, idim_max_buf + 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, origin, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &statusMPI);
349  if (ierr != 0) exitMPI(-1);
350 
351  dam_pr = 0.0;
352  if (X->Large.mode == M_MLTPLY) {
353 #pragma omp parallel for default(none) reduction(+:dam_pr) private(j, dmv, Fsgn, ioff) \
354  firstprivate(idim_max_buf, trans, X) shared(list_2_1, list_2_2, list_1buf, v1buf, tmp_v1, tmp_v0)
355  for (j = 1; j <= idim_max_buf; j++) {
356  GetOffComp(list_2_1, list_2_2, list_1buf[j],
357  X->Large.irght, X->Large.ilft, X->Large.ihfbit, &ioff);
358  dmv = trans * v1buf[j];
359  tmp_v0[ioff] += dmv;
360  dam_pr += conj(tmp_v1[ioff]) * dmv;
361  }
362  }
363  else {
364 #pragma omp parallel for default(none) reduction(+:dam_pr) private(j, dmv, Fsgn, ioff) \
365  firstprivate(idim_max_buf, trans, X) shared(list_2_1, list_2_2, list_1buf, v1buf, tmp_v1, tmp_v0)
366  for (j = 1; j <= idim_max_buf; j++) {
367  GetOffComp(list_2_1, list_2_2, list_1buf[j],
368  X->Large.irght, X->Large.ilft, X->Large.ihfbit, &ioff);
369  dmv = trans * v1buf[j];
370  dam_pr += conj(tmp_v1[ioff]) * dmv;
371  }
372  }
373  return (dam_pr);
374 
375 #endif
376 }/*void child_general_hopp_MPIdouble*/

SgnBit

function of getting fermion sign

double complex X_child_general_hopp_MPIsingle ( int  org_isite1,
int  org_ispin1,
int  org_isite2,
int  org_ispin2,
double complex  tmp_trans,
struct BindStruct *  X,
double complex *  tmp_v0,
double complex *  tmp_v1 
)

Hopping term in Hubbard (Kondo) + Canonical ensemble When only site2 is in the inter process region.

Author
Mitsuaki Kawamura (The University of Tokyo)
Parameters
[in,out]X
[out]tmp_v0Result v0 = H v1
[in]tmp_v1v0 = H v1

Definition at line 414 of file mltplyMPI.c.

422  {
423 #ifdef MPI
424  int mask2, state2, ierr, origin, bit2diff, Fsgn;
425  unsigned long int mask1, state1, idim_max_buf, j, state1check, bit1diff, ioff, jreal;
426  MPI_Status statusMPI;
427  double complex trans, dmv, dam_pr;
428  /*
429  Prepare index in the inter PE
430  */
431  mask2 = (int)X->Def.Tpow[2 * org_isite2+org_ispin2];
432  bit2diff = mask2 - 1;
433  origin = myrank ^ mask2;
434 
435  state2 = origin & mask2;
436 
437  SgnBit((unsigned long int) (origin & bit2diff), &Fsgn); // Fermion sign
438 
439  ierr = MPI_Sendrecv(&X->Check.idim_max, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, origin, 0,
440  &idim_max_buf, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, origin, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &statusMPI);
441  if (ierr != 0) exitMPI(-1);
442  ierr = MPI_Sendrecv(list_1, X->Check.idim_max + 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, origin, 0,
443  list_1buf, idim_max_buf + 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, origin, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &statusMPI);
444  if (ierr != 0) exitMPI(-1);
445  ierr = MPI_Sendrecv(tmp_v1, X->Check.idim_max + 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, origin, 0,
446  v1buf, idim_max_buf + 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, origin, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &statusMPI);
447  if (ierr != 0) exitMPI(-1);
448 
449  /*
450  Index in the intra PE
451  */
452  mask1 = X->Def.Tpow[2 * org_isite1 + org_ispin1];
453  if (state2 == mask2) {
454  trans = -(double) Fsgn * tmp_trans;
455  state1check = 0;
456  }
457  else if (state2 == 0) {
458  state1check = mask1;
459  trans = -(double) Fsgn * conj(tmp_trans);
460  if (X->Large.mode == M_CORR) {
461  trans = 0;
462  }
463  }
464  else return 0;
465 
466  bit1diff = X->Def.Tpow[2 * X->Def.Nsite - 1] * 2 - mask1 * 2;
467 
468  dam_pr = 0.0;
469  if (X->Large.mode == M_MLTPLY) {
470 #pragma omp parallel for default(none) reduction(+:dam_pr) private(j, dmv, Fsgn, ioff, jreal, state1) \
471  firstprivate(idim_max_buf, trans, X, mask1, state1check, bit1diff) shared(list_2_1, list_2_2, list_1buf, v1buf, tmp_v1, tmp_v0)
472  for (j = 1; j <= idim_max_buf; j++) {
473 
474  jreal = list_1buf[j];
475  state1 = jreal & mask1;
476 
477  if (state1 == state1check) {
478 
479  SgnBit(jreal & bit1diff, &Fsgn);
480  GetOffComp(list_2_1, list_2_2, jreal ^ mask1,
481  X->Large.irght, X->Large.ilft, X->Large.ihfbit, &ioff);
482 
483  dmv = (double) Fsgn * trans * v1buf[j];
484  tmp_v0[ioff] += dmv;
485  dam_pr += conj(tmp_v1[ioff]) * dmv;
486  }
487  }
488  }
489  else {
490 #pragma omp parallel for default(none) reduction(+:dam_pr) private(j, dmv, Fsgn, ioff, jreal, state1) \
491  firstprivate(idim_max_buf, trans, X, mask1, state1check, bit1diff) shared(list_2_1, list_2_2, list_1buf, v1buf, tmp_v1, tmp_v0)
492  for (j = 1; j <= idim_max_buf; j++) {
493 
494  jreal = list_1buf[j];
495  state1 = jreal & mask1;
496 
497  if (state1 == state1check) {
498 
499  SgnBit(jreal & bit1diff, &Fsgn);
500  GetOffComp(list_2_1, list_2_2, jreal ^ mask1,
501  X->Large.irght, X->Large.ilft, X->Large.ihfbit, &ioff);
502 
503  dmv = (double) Fsgn * trans * v1buf[j];
504  dam_pr += conj(tmp_v1[ioff]) * dmv;
505  }
506  }
507  }
508  return (dam_pr);
509 #endif
510 }/*double complex child_general_hopp_MPIsingle*/

)

Exchange term in Spin model When both site1 and site2 are in the inter process region.

Author
Mitsuaki Kawamura (The University of Tokyo)

Definition at line 546 of file mltplyMPI.c.

557  {
558 #ifdef MPI
559  int mask1, mask2, state1, state2, ierr, origin;
560  unsigned long int idim_max_buf, j, ioff;
561  MPI_Status statusMPI;
562  double complex Jint, dmv, dam_pr;
563 
564  mask1 = (int) X->Def.Tpow[org_isite1];
565  mask2 = (int) X->Def.Tpow[org_isite3];
566  origin = myrank ^ (mask1 + mask2);
567 
568  state1 = (origin & mask1) / mask1;
569  state2 = (origin & mask2) / mask2;
570 
571  if (state1 == org_ispin2 && state2 == org_ispin4) {
572  Jint = tmp_J;
573  }
574  else if (state1 == org_ispin1 && state2 == org_ispin3) {
575  Jint = conj(tmp_J);
576  if (X->Large.mode == M_CORR) {
577  Jint = 0;
578  }
579  }
580  else return 0;
581 
582  ierr = MPI_Sendrecv(&X->Check.idim_max, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, origin, 0,
583  &idim_max_buf, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, origin, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &statusMPI);
584  if (ierr != 0) exitMPI(-1);
585  ierr = MPI_Sendrecv(list_1, X->Check.idim_max + 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, origin, 0,
586  list_1buf, idim_max_buf + 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, origin, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &statusMPI);
587  if (ierr != 0) exitMPI(-1);
588  ierr = MPI_Sendrecv(tmp_v1, X->Check.idim_max + 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, origin, 0,
589  v1buf, idim_max_buf + 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, origin, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &statusMPI);
590  if (ierr != 0) exitMPI(-1);
591 
592  dam_pr = 0.0;
593  if (X->Large.mode == M_MLTPLY) {
594 #pragma omp parallel for default(none) reduction(+:dam_pr) private(j, dmv, ioff) \
595  firstprivate(idim_max_buf, Jint, X) shared(list_2_1, list_2_2, list_1buf, v1buf, tmp_v1, tmp_v0)
596  for (j = 1; j <= idim_max_buf; j++) {
597  GetOffComp(list_2_1, list_2_2, list_1buf[j],
598  X->Large.irght, X->Large.ilft, X->Large.ihfbit, &ioff);
599  dmv = Jint * v1buf[j];
600  tmp_v0[ioff] += dmv;
601  dam_pr += conj(tmp_v1[ioff]) * dmv;
602  }
603 
604  }
605  else {
606 #pragma omp parallel for default(none) reduction(+:dam_pr) private(j, dmv, ioff) \
607  firstprivate(idim_max_buf, Jint, X) shared(list_2_1, list_2_2, list_1buf, v1buf, tmp_v1, tmp_v0)
608  for (j = 1; j <= idim_max_buf; j++) {
609  GetOffComp(list_2_1, list_2_2, list_1buf[j],
610  X->Large.irght, X->Large.ilft, X->Large.ihfbit, &ioff);
611  dmv = Jint * v1buf[j];
612  dam_pr += conj(tmp_v1[ioff]) * dmv;
613  }
614  }
615  return dam_pr;
616 #endif

718 #ifdef MPI

775

779  firstprivate(idim_max_buf, Jint, X, mask1, state1check, org_isite1) shared(list_2_1, list_2_2, list_1buf, v1buf, tmp_v1, tmp_v0)

791  dam_pr += conj(tmp_v1[ioff]) * dmv;
792  }
793  }
794  }

Exchange term in Spin model When both site1 and site2 are in the inter process region.

Mitsuaki Kawamura (The University of Tokyo)

Definition at line 627 of file mltplyMPI.c.

634 {
635 #ifdef MPI
636  int mask1, mask2, num1_up, num2_up, ierr, origin;
637  unsigned long int idim_max_buf, j, ioff, ibit_tmp;
638  MPI_Status statusMPI;
639  double complex dmv, dam_pr;
640 
641  mask1 = (int)X->Def.Tpow[org_isite1];
642  mask2 = (int)X->Def.Tpow[org_isite3];
643  if(mask1 == mask2){
644  origin = myrank ^ mask1;
645  }
646  else{
647  origin = myrank ^ (mask1 + mask2);
648  }
649  num1_up = (origin & mask1) / mask1;
650  num2_up = (origin & mask2) / mask2;
651 
652  ibit_tmp=(num1_up)^(num2_up);
653  if(ibit_tmp ==0) return 0;
654 
655  ierr = MPI_Sendrecv(&X->Check.idim_max, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, origin, 0,
656  &idim_max_buf, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, origin, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &statusMPI);
657  if(ierr != 0) exitMPI(-1);
658  ierr = MPI_Sendrecv(list_1, X->Check.idim_max + 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, origin, 0,
659  list_1buf, idim_max_buf + 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, origin, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &statusMPI);
660  if(ierr != 0) exitMPI(-1);
661  ierr = MPI_Sendrecv(tmp_v1, X->Check.idim_max + 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, origin, 0,
662  v1buf, idim_max_buf + 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, origin, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &statusMPI);
663  if(ierr != 0) exitMPI(-1);
664 
665  dam_pr = 0.0;
666  #pragma omp parallel for default(none) reduction(+:dam_pr) private(j, dmv, ioff) \
667  firstprivate(idim_max_buf, X) shared(list_2_1, list_2_2, list_1buf, v1buf, tmp_v1, tmp_v0)
668  for (j = 1; j <= idim_max_buf; j++) {
669  GetOffComp(list_2_1, list_2_2, list_1buf[j],
670  X->Large.irght, X->Large.ilft, X->Large.ihfbit, &ioff);
671  dmv = 0.5 * v1buf[j];
672  dam_pr += conj(tmp_v1[ioff]) * dmv;
673  }
674  return dam_pr;
675 #endif
676 }/*double complex X_child_general_int_spin_MPIdouble*/

2774  int mask1;

2776  double complex dam_pr;
2777  mask1 = (int)X->Def.Tpow[org_isite1];
2778  ibit1 = (((unsigned long int)myrank& mask1)/mask1)^(1-org_ispin1);
2779 
2780  dam_pr =0.0;
2781  if(ibit1 == 0) {
2782  if (X->Large.mode == M_MLTPLY) { // for multply

2784  firstprivate(X, tmp_trans) private(j)

1141 #ifdef MPI
1142  long unsigned int mask1, mask2, num1,num2;
1143  unsigned long int j;
1144 // MPI_Status statusMPI;
1145  double complex dmv, dam_pr;
1146  mask1 = (int)X->Def.Tpow[org_isite1];
1147  mask2 = (int)X->Def.Tpow[org_isite3];
1148  num1 = X_SpinGC_CisAis((unsigned long int)myrank + 1, X, mask1, org_ispin1);
1149  num2 = X_SpinGC_CisAis((unsigned long int)myrank + 1, X, mask2, org_ispin3);
1150 
1151  dam_pr = 0.0;
1152  if (X->Large.mode == M_MLTPLY){
1153 #pragma omp parallel for default(none) reduction(+:dam_pr) private(j, dmv) \
1154  firstprivate(tmp_J, X, num1, num2) shared(tmp_v1, tmp_v0)
1155  for (j = 1; j <= X->Check.idim_max; j++) {
1156  dmv = num1*num2*tmp_v1[j]*tmp_J;
1157  tmp_v0[j] += dmv;
1158  dam_pr += conj(tmp_v1[j]) * dmv;
1159  }
1160  }
1161  else {
1162 #pragma omp parallel for default(none) reduction(+:dam_pr) private(j, dmv) \
1163  firstprivate(tmp_J, X, num1, num2) shared(tmp_v1, tmp_v0)

1165  dmv = num1 * num2 * tmp_v1[j] * tmp_J;
1166  dam_pr += conj(tmp_v1[j]) * dmv;
1167  }
1168  }
1169  return(dam_pr);
1170 #endif

CisAisCjuAjv term in Spin model + GC When both site1 and site2 are in the inter process region.

Author
Kazuyoshi Yoshimi (The University of Tokyo)

Definition at line 950 of file mltplyMPI.c.

959  {
960 #ifdef MPI
961  int mask1, mask2, state2, ierr;
962  long int origin, num1;
963  unsigned long int idim_max_buf, j;
964  MPI_Status statusMPI;
965  double complex Jint, dmv, dam_pr;
966 
967  if (org_isite1 == org_isite3 && org_ispin1 == org_ispin4) {//CisAisCitAis
968  return 0.0;
969  }
970 
971  mask1 = (int) X->Def.Tpow[org_isite1];
972  mask2 = (int) X->Def.Tpow[org_isite3];
973  origin = myrank ^ mask2;
974  state2 = (origin & mask2) / mask2;
975  num1 = X_SpinGC_CisAis((unsigned long int) myrank + 1, X, mask1, org_ispin1);
976  if (num1 != 0 && state2 == org_ispin4) {
977  Jint = tmp_J;
978  }
979  else if (X_SpinGC_CisAis(origin + 1, X, mask1, org_ispin1) == TRUE && state2 == org_ispin3) {
980  Jint = conj(tmp_J);
981  if (X->Large.mode == M_CORR) Jint = 0;
982  }
983  else {
984  return 0.0;
985  }
986 
987  ierr = MPI_Sendrecv(&X->Check.idim_max, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, origin, 0,
988  &idim_max_buf, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, origin, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &statusMPI);
989  if (ierr != 0) exitMPI(-1);
990  ierr = MPI_Sendrecv(tmp_v1, X->Check.idim_max + 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, origin, 0,
991  v1buf, idim_max_buf + 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, origin, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &statusMPI);
992  if (ierr != 0) exitMPI(-1);
993 
994  dam_pr = 0.0;
995  if (X->Large.mode == M_MLTPLY) {
996 #pragma omp parallel for default(none) reduction(+:dam_pr) private(j, dmv) \
997  firstprivate(idim_max_buf, Jint, X) shared(v1buf, tmp_v1, tmp_v0)
998  for (j = 1; j <= idim_max_buf; j++) {
999  dmv = Jint * v1buf[j];
1000  tmp_v0[j] += dmv;
1001  dam_pr += conj(tmp_v1[j]) * dmv;
1002  }
1003  }
1004  else {
1005 #pragma omp parallel for default(none) reduction(+:dam_pr) private(j, dmv) \
1006  firstprivate(idim_max_buf, Jint, X) shared(v1buf, tmp_v1, tmp_v0)
1007  for (j = 1; j <= idim_max_buf; j++) {
1008  dmv = Jint * v1buf[j];
1009  dam_pr += conj(tmp_v1[j]) * dmv;
1010  }
1011  }
1012  return (dam_pr);
1013 #endif
1014 }/*double complex X_GC_child_CisAisCjuAjv_spin_MPIdouble*/

CisAisCjuAjv term in Spin model + GC When only site2 is in the inter process region.

Author
Kazuyoshi Yoshimi (The University of Tokyo)

Definition at line 1379 of file mltplyMPI.c.

1379  {
1380 #ifdef MPI
1381  int mask2, state2, ierr, origin;
1382  unsigned long int mask1, idim_max_buf, j, state1, state1check;
1383  MPI_Status statusMPI;
1384  double complex Jint, dmv, dam_pr;
1385  /*
1386  Prepare index in the inter PE
1387  */
1388  mask2 = (int) X->Def.Tpow[org_isite3];
1389  origin = myrank ^ mask2;
1390  state2 = (origin & mask2) / mask2;
1391  if (state2 == org_ispin4) {
1392  state1check = (unsigned long int) org_ispin1;
1393  Jint = tmp_J;
1394  }
1395  else if (state2 == org_ispin3) {
1396  state1check = (unsigned long int) org_ispin1;
1397  Jint = conj(tmp_J);
1398  if (X->Large.mode == M_CORR) {
1399  Jint = 0;
1400  }
1401  }
1402  else return 0.0;
1403 
1404  ierr = MPI_Sendrecv(&X->Check.idim_max, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, origin, 0,
1405  &idim_max_buf, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, origin, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &statusMPI);
1406  if (ierr != 0) exitMPI(-1);
1407  ierr = MPI_Sendrecv(tmp_v1, X->Check.idim_max + 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, origin, 0,
1408  v1buf, idim_max_buf + 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, origin, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &statusMPI);
1409  if (ierr != 0) exitMPI(-1);
1410  /*
1411  Index in the intra PE
1412  */
1413  mask1 = X->Def.Tpow[org_isite1];
1414 
1415  dam_pr = 0.0;
1416  if (X->Large.mode == M_MLTPLY) {
1417 #pragma omp parallel for default(none) reduction(+:dam_pr) private(j, dmv, state1) \
1418  firstprivate(idim_max_buf, Jint, X, state1check, mask1) shared(v1buf, tmp_v1, tmp_v0)
1419  for (j = 0; j < idim_max_buf; j++) {
1420  state1 = (j & mask1) / mask1;
1421  if (state1 == state1check) {
1422  dmv = Jint * v1buf[j + 1];
1423  tmp_v0[j + 1] += dmv;
1424  dam_pr += conj(tmp_v1[j + 1]) * dmv;
1425  }
1426  }
1427  }
1428  else {
1429 #pragma omp parallel for default(none) reduction(+:dam_pr) private(j, dmv, state1) \
1430  firstprivate(idim_max_buf, Jint, X, state1check, mask1) shared(v1buf, tmp_v1, tmp_v0)
1431  for (j = 0; j < idim_max_buf; j++) {
1432  state1 = (j & mask1) / mask1;
1433  if (state1 == state1check) {
1434  dmv = Jint * v1buf[j + 1];
1435  dam_pr += conj(tmp_v1[j + 1]) * dmv;
1436  }
1437  }
1438  }
1439  return (dam_pr);
1440 
1441 #endif
1442 }/*void GC_child_CisAitCiuAiv_spin_MPIsingle*/

1897 #ifdef MPI
1898  unsigned long int off, j;
1899  int origin, ierr;
1900  double complex tmp_V, dmv, dam_pr;
1901  MPI_Status statusMPI;
1902 
1903  if (GetOffCompGeneralSpin((unsigned long int) myrank, org_isite1 + 1, org_ispin1, org_ispin2,
1904  &off, X->Def.SiteToBit, X->Def.Tpow) == TRUE) {
1905  tmp_V = tmp_trans;
1906  }
1907  else if (GetOffCompGeneralSpin((unsigned long int) myrank,
1908  org_isite1 + 1, org_ispin2, org_ispin1, &off,
1909  X->Def.SiteToBit, X->Def.Tpow) == TRUE) {
1910  tmp_V = conj(tmp_trans);
1911  if (X->Large.mode == M_CORR) tmp_V = 0.0;
1912  }

1918  v1buf, X->Check.idim_max + 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, origin, 0,
1919  MPI_COMM_WORLD, &statusMPI);
1920  if (ierr != 0) exitMPI(-1);
1921 
1922  dam_pr = 0.0;
1923  if (X->Large.mode == M_MLTPLY) {

1925  for (j = 1; j <= X->Check.idim_max; j++) {
1926  dmv = v1buf[j] * tmp_V;
1927  tmp_v0[j] += dmv;
1928  dam_pr += conj(tmp_v1[j]) * dmv;
1929  }
1930

1935  dmv = v1buf[j] * tmp_V;
1936  dam_pr += conj(tmp_v1[j]) * dmv;
1937  }
1938  }
1939  return dam_pr;
1940 #endif

Hopping term in Spin + GC When both site1 and site2 are in the inter process region.

Author
Kazuyoshi Yoshimi (The University of Tokyo)

2655 {
2656 #ifdef MPI
2657  int mask1, state1, ierr, origin;
2658  unsigned long int idim_max_buf, j;
2659  MPI_Status statusMPI;
2660  double complex trans, dmv, dam_pr;
2661 
2662  mask1 = (int)X->Def.Tpow[org_isite1];
2663  origin = myrank ^ mask1;
2664  state1 = (origin & mask1)/mask1;
2665 
2666  if(state1 == org_ispin2){
2667  trans = tmp_trans;
2668  }
2669  else if(state1 == org_ispin1) {
2670  trans = conj(tmp_trans);
2671  if(X->Large.mode == M_CORR){
2672  trans = 0.0;
2673  }
2674  }
2675  else{
2676  return 0.0;
2677  }

2684  if(ierr != 0) exitMPI(-1);
2685

2687  if(X->Large.mode == M_MLTPLY){
2688 #pragma omp parallel for default(none) reduction(+:dam_pr) private(j, dmv) firstprivate(idim_max_buf, trans, X) shared(v1buf, tmp_v1, tmp_v0)
2689  for (j = 1; j <= X->Check.idim_max ; j++) {

2692  dam_pr += conj(tmp_v1[j]) * dmv;

Exchange and Pairlifting term in Spin model + GC When both site1 and site2 are in the inter process region.

Author
Kazuyoshi Yoshimi (The University of Tokyo)

Definition at line 845 of file mltplyMPI.c.

849  {
850 #ifdef MPI
851  int mask1, mask2, state1, state2, ierr, origin;
852  unsigned long int idim_max_buf, j;
853  MPI_Status statusMPI;
854  double complex Jint, dmv, dam_pr;
855 
856  mask1 = (int) X->Def.Tpow[org_isite1];
857  mask2 = (int) X->Def.Tpow[org_isite3];
858  if (org_isite1 != org_isite3) {
859  origin = myrank ^ (mask1 + mask2);
860  }
861  else {
862  if (org_ispin1 == org_ispin4 && org_ispin2 == org_ispin3) { //CisAitCitAis=CisAis
863  dam_pr = X_GC_child_CisAis_spin_MPIdouble(org_isite1, org_ispin1, tmp_J, X, tmp_v0, tmp_v1);
864  return (dam_pr);
865  }
866  else { //CisAitCisAit=0
867  return 0.0;
868  }
869  }
870 
871 
872  state1 = (origin & mask1) / mask1;
873  state2 = (origin & mask2) / mask2;
874 
875  if (state1 == org_ispin2 && state2 == org_ispin4) {
876  Jint = tmp_J;
877  }
878  else if (state1 == org_ispin1 && state2 == org_ispin3) {
879  Jint = conj(tmp_J);
880  if (X->Large.mode == M_CORR) {
881  Jint = 0;
882  }
883  }
884  else {
885  return 0;
886  }
887 
888  ierr = MPI_Sendrecv(&X->Check.idim_max, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, origin, 0,
889  &idim_max_buf, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, origin, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &statusMPI);
890  if (ierr != 0) exitMPI(-1);
891  ierr = MPI_Sendrecv(tmp_v1, X->Check.idim_max + 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, origin, 0,
892  v1buf, idim_max_buf + 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, origin, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &statusMPI);
893  if (ierr != 0) exitMPI(-1);
894 
895  dam_pr = 0.0;
896  if (X->Large.mode == M_MLTPLY) {
897 #pragma omp parallel for default(none) reduction(+:dam_pr) private(j, dmv) \
898  firstprivate(idim_max_buf, Jint, X) shared(v1buf, tmp_v1, tmp_v0)
899  for (j = 1; j <= idim_max_buf; j++) {
900  dmv = Jint * v1buf[j];
901  tmp_v0[j] += dmv;
902  dam_pr += conj(tmp_v1[j]) * dmv;
903  }
904  }
905  else {
906 #pragma omp parallel for default(none) reduction(+:dam_pr) private(j, dmv) \
907  firstprivate(idim_max_buf, Jint, X) shared(v1buf, tmp_v1, tmp_v0)

909  dmv = Jint * v1buf[j];
910  dam_pr += conj(tmp_v1[j]) * dmv;
911  }
912  }
913  return dam_pr;
914 
915 #endif

1329  dam_pr += conj(tmp_v1[ioff + 1]) * dmv;

1739  dam_pr = 0.0;
1740  if (X->Large.mode == M_MLTPLY) {
1741 #pragma omp parallel for default(none) reduction(+:dam_pr) firstprivate(X, tmp_V) private(j, dmv) shared (tmp_v0, tmp_v1, v1buf)
1742  for (j = 1; j <= X->Check.idim_max; j++) {
1743  dmv = v1buf[j] * tmp_V;
1744  tmp_v0[j] += dmv;
1745  dam_pr += conj(tmp_v1[j]) * dmv;
1746  }
1747 
1748  }
1749  else {
1750 #pragma omp parallel for default(none) reduction(+:dam_pr) firstprivate(X, tmp_V) private(j, dmv) shared (tmp_v0, tmp_v1, v1buf)
1751  for (j = 1; j <= X->Check.idim_max; j++) {
1752  dmv = v1buf[j] * tmp_V;
1753  dam_pr += conj(tmp_v1[j]) * dmv;
1754  }
1755  }
1756  return dam_pr;
1757 #endif
1758 }

CisAisCjuAjv term in Spin model + GC When both site1 and site2 are in the inter process region.

Author
Kazuyoshi Yoshimi (The University of Tokyo)

Definition at line 1048 of file mltplyMPI.c.

1057  {
1058 #ifdef MPI
1059  int mask1, mask2, state1, ierr, num1;
1060  long int origin;
1061  unsigned long int idim_max_buf, j;
1062  MPI_Status statusMPI;
1063  double complex Jint, dmv, dam_pr;
1064 
1065  if (org_isite1 == org_isite3 && org_ispin1 == org_ispin3) {//cisaitcisais
1066  return 0.0;
1067  }
1068 
1069  mask1 = (int) X->Def.Tpow[org_isite1];
1070  origin = myrank ^ mask1;
1071  state1 = (origin & mask1) / mask1;
1072  mask2 = (int) X->Def.Tpow[org_isite3];
1073  num1 = X_SpinGC_CisAis(origin + 1, X, mask2, org_ispin3);
1074  if (state1 == org_ispin2) {
1075  if(num1 !=0){
1076  Jint = tmp_J;
1077  }
1078  else{
1079  return 0.0;
1080  }
1081  }
1082  else{//state1 = org_ispin1
1083  num1 = X_SpinGC_CisAis((unsigned long int) myrank + 1, X, mask2, org_ispin3);
1084  if (num1 != 0) {
1085  Jint = conj(tmp_J);
1086  if (X->Large.mode == M_CORR) {
1087  Jint = 0;
1088  }
1089  }
1090  else {
1091  return 0.0;
1092  }
1093  }
1094 
1095  ierr = MPI_Sendrecv(&X->Check.idim_max, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, origin, 0,
1096  &idim_max_buf, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, origin, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &statusMPI);
1097  if(ierr != 0) exitMPI(-1);
1098  ierr = MPI_Sendrecv(tmp_v1, X->Check.idim_max + 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, origin, 0,
1099  v1buf, idim_max_buf + 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, origin, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &statusMPI);
1100  if (ierr != 0) exitMPI(-1);
1101 
1102  dam_pr = 0.0;
1103  if (X->Large.mode == M_MLTPLY) {
1104 #pragma omp parallel for default(none) reduction(+:dam_pr) private(j, dmv) \
1105  firstprivate(idim_max_buf, Jint, X) shared(v1buf, tmp_v1, tmp_v0)
1106  for (j = 1; j <= idim_max_buf; j++) {
1107  dmv = Jint * v1buf[j];
1108  tmp_v0[j] += dmv;
1109  dam_pr += conj(tmp_v1[j]) * dmv;
1110  }
1111  }
1112  else {
1113 #pragma omp parallel for default(none) reduction(+:dam_pr) private(j, dmv) \
1114  firstprivate(idim_max_buf, Jint, X) shared(v1buf, tmp_v1, tmp_v0)
1115  for (j = 1; j <= idim_max_buf; j++) {
1116  dmv = Jint * v1buf[j];
1117  dam_pr += conj(tmp_v1[j]) * dmv;
1118  }
1119  }
1120  return (dam_pr);
1121 #endif
1122 }/*double complex X_GC_child_CisAisCjuAjv_spin_MPIdouble*/

1472  {
1473 #ifdef MPI
1474  int mask2, state2;
1475  unsigned long int mask1, j, ioff, state1, state1check;
1476  //MPI_Status statusMPI;
1477  double complex Jint, dmv, dam_pr;
1478  /*
1479  Prepare index in the inter PE
1480  */
1481  mask2 = (int) X->Def.Tpow[org_isite3];
1482  state2 = (myrank & mask2) / mask2;
1483 
1484  if (state2 == org_ispin3) {
1485  state1check = org_ispin2;
1486  Jint = tmp_J;
1487  }
1488  else {
1489  return 0.0;
1490  }
1491 
1492  mask1 = (int) X->Def.Tpow[org_isite1];
1493 
1494  dam_pr = 0.0;
1495  if (X->Large.mode == M_MLTPLY) {
1496 #pragma omp parallel for default(none) reduction(+:dam_pr) private(j, dmv, state1, ioff) \
1497  firstprivate(Jint, X, state1check, mask1) shared( tmp_v1, tmp_v0)
1498  for (j = 0; j < X->Check.idim_max; j++) {
1499 
1500  state1 = (j & mask1) / mask1;
1501  ioff = j ^ mask1;
1502  if (state1 == state1check) {
1503  dmv = Jint * tmp_v1[j + 1];
1504  }
1505  else {
1506  dmv = conj(Jint) * tmp_v1[j + 1];
1507  }
1508  tmp_v0[ioff + 1] += dmv;
1509  dam_pr += conj(tmp_v1[ioff + 1]) * dmv;
1510  }
1511  }
1512  else if (X->Large.mode == M_CORR) {
1513 #pragma omp parallel for default(none) reduction(+:dam_pr) private(j, dmv, state1, ioff) \
1514  firstprivate(Jint, X, state1check, mask1) shared( tmp_v1, tmp_v0)
1515  for (j = 0; j < X->Check.idim_max; j++) {
1516 
1517  state1 = (j & mask1) / mask1;
1518  ioff = j ^ mask1;
1519  if (state1 == state1check) {
1520  dmv = Jint * tmp_v1[j + 1];
1521  }
1522  else {
1523  dmv = 0.0;
1524  }
1525  dam_pr += conj(tmp_v1[ioff + 1]) * dmv;
1526  }
1527 
1528  }
1529  else {
1530 #pragma omp parallel for default(none) reduction(+:dam_pr) private(j, dmv, state1, ioff) \
1531  firstprivate(Jint, X, state1check, mask1) shared( tmp_v1, tmp_v0)

1533

1543  }
1544  }

3428 
3429 #pragma omp parallel for default(none) reduction(+:dam_pr) private(j, dmv) firstprivate(idim_max_buf, tmp_V, X) shared(v1buf, tmp_v1, tmp_v0)
3430  for (j = 1; j <= idim_max_buf; j++) {
3431  dmv = tmp_V * v1buf[j];
3432  tmp_v0[j] += dmv;
3433  dam_pr += conj(tmp_v1[j]) * dmv;
3434  }
3435  }
3436  else {
3437 #pragma omp parallel for default(none) reduction(+:dam_pr) private(j, dmv) firstprivate(idim_max_buf, tmp_V, X) shared(v1buf, tmp_v1, tmp_v0)
3438  for (j = 1; j <= idim_max_buf; j++) {
3439  dmv = tmp_V * v1buf[j];
3440  dam_pr += conj(tmp_v1[j]) * dmv;
3441  }
3442  }
3443  }
3444  else {
3445  org_rankbit = X->Def.OrgTpow[2 * X->Def.Nsite] * origin;
3446  if (X->Large.mode == M_MLTPLY) {
3447 #pragma omp parallel for default(none) reduction(+:dam_pr) private(j, dmv, tmp_off, Fsgn) firstprivate(idim_max_buf, tmp_V, X, tmp_isite1, tmp_isite2, tmp_isite3, tmp_isite4, org_rankbit) shared(v1buf, tmp_v1, tmp_v0)
3448  for (j = 1; j <= idim_max_buf; j++) {
3449 
3450  if (GetSgnInterAll(tmp_isite3, tmp_isite4, tmp_isite1, tmp_isite2, &Fsgn, X, (j - 1) + org_rankbit,
3451  &tmp_off) == TRUE) {
3452  dmv = tmp_V * v1buf[j] * Fsgn;
3453  tmp_v0[tmp_off + 1] += dmv;
3454  dam_pr += conj(tmp_v1[tmp_off + 1]) * dmv;
3455  }
3456  }
3457  }
3458  else {
3459 #pragma omp parallel for default(none) reduction(+:dam_pr) private(j, dmv, tmp_off, Fsgn) firstprivate(idim_max_buf, tmp_V, X, tmp_isite1, tmp_isite2, tmp_isite3, tmp_isite4, org_rankbit) shared(v1buf, tmp_v1, tmp_v0)
3460  for (j = 1; j <= idim_max_buf; j++) {
3461 
3462  if (GetSgnInterAll(tmp_isite3, tmp_isite4, tmp_isite1, tmp_isite2, &Fsgn, X, (j - 1) + org_rankbit,
3463  &tmp_off) == TRUE) {
3464  dmv = tmp_V * v1buf[j] * Fsgn;
3465  dam_pr += conj(tmp_v1[tmp_off + 1]) * dmv;
3466  }
3467  }
3468  }
3469  }
3470  }
3471 
3472  return dam_pr;
3473 #endif
3474 }

double complex X_GC_child_general_hopp_MPIdouble ( int  org_isite1,
int  org_ispin1,
int  org_isite2,
int  org_ispin2,
double complex  tmp_trans,
struct BindStruct *  X,
double complex *  tmp_v0,
double complex *  tmp_v1 
)

Hopping term in Hubbard + GC When both site1 and site2 are in the inter process region.

Author
Mitsuaki Kawamura (The University of Tokyo)
Parameters
[in,out]X
[out]tmp_v0Result v0 = H v1
[in]tmp_v1v0 = H v1

Definition at line 68 of file mltplyMPI.c.

76  {
77 #ifdef MPI
78  int mask1, mask2, state1, state2, ierr, origin, bitdiff, Fsgn;
79  unsigned long int idim_max_buf, j;
80  MPI_Status statusMPI;
81  double complex trans, dmv, dam_pr;
82 
83  mask1 = (int) X->Def.Tpow[2 * org_isite1 + org_ispin1];
84  mask2 = (int) X->Def.Tpow[2 * org_isite2 + org_ispin2];
85  if (mask2 > mask1) bitdiff = mask2 - mask1 * 2;
86  else bitdiff = mask1 - mask2 * 2;
87  origin = myrank ^ (mask1 + mask2);
88 
89  state1 = origin & mask1;
90  state2 = origin & mask2;
91 
92  SgnBit((unsigned long int) (origin & bitdiff), &Fsgn); // Fermion sign
93 
94  if (state1 == 0 && state2 == mask2) {
95  trans = -(double) Fsgn * tmp_trans;
96  }
97  else if (state1 == mask1 && state2 == 0) {
98  trans = -(double) Fsgn * conj(tmp_trans);
99  if (X->Large.mode == M_CORR) {
100  trans = 0;
101  }
102  }
103  else return 0;
104 
105  ierr = MPI_Sendrecv(&X->Check.idim_max, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, origin, 0,
106  &idim_max_buf, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, origin, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &statusMPI);
107  if (ierr != 0) {
108  exitMPI(-1);
109  }
110  ierr = MPI_Sendrecv(tmp_v1, X->Check.idim_max + 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, origin, 0,
111  v1buf, idim_max_buf + 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, origin, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &statusMPI);
112  if (ierr != 0) {
113  exitMPI(-1);
114  }
115  dam_pr = 0.0;
116  if (X->Large.mode == M_MLTPLY) {
117 #pragma omp parallel for default(none) reduction(+:dam_pr) private(j, dmv) firstprivate(idim_max_buf, trans, X) shared(v1buf, tmp_v1, tmp_v0)
118  for (j = 1; j <= idim_max_buf; j++) {
119  dmv = trans * v1buf[j];
120  tmp_v0[j] += dmv;
121  dam_pr += conj(tmp_v1[j]) * dmv;
122  }
123  }
124  else {
125 #pragma omp parallel for default(none) reduction(+:dam_pr) private(j, dmv) firstprivate(idim_max_buf, trans, X) shared(v1buf, tmp_v1, tmp_v0)
126  for (j = 1; j <= idim_max_buf; j++) {
127  dmv = trans * v1buf[j];
128  dam_pr += conj(tmp_v1[j]) * dmv;
129  }
130  }
131  return (dam_pr);
132 
133 #endif
134 }/*void GC_child_general_hopp_MPIdouble*/

double complex X_GC_child_general_hopp_MPIsingle ( int  org_isite1,
int  org_ispin1,
int  org_isite2,
int  org_ispin2,
double complex  tmp_trans,
struct BindStruct *  X,
double complex *  tmp_v0,
double complex *  tmp_v1 
)

Hopping term in Hubbard + GC When only site2 is in the inter process region.

Author
Mitsuaki Kawamura (The University of Tokyo)
Kazuyoshi Yoshimi (The University of Tokyo)
Parameters
[in,out]X
[out]tmp_v0Result v0 = H v1
[in]tmp_v1v0 = H v1

Definition at line 174 of file mltplyMPI.c.

182  {
183 #ifdef MPI
184  int mask2, state1, state2, ierr, origin, bit2diff, Fsgn;
185  unsigned long int idim_max_buf, j, mask1, state1check, bit1diff, ioff;
186  MPI_Status statusMPI;
187  double complex trans, dmv, dam_pr;
188  /*
189  Prepare index in the inter PE
190  */
191  mask2 = (int) X->Def.Tpow[2 * org_isite2 + org_ispin2];
192  bit2diff = mask2 - 1;
193  origin = myrank ^ mask2;
194  state2 = origin & mask2;
195 
196  SgnBit((unsigned long int) (origin & bit2diff), &Fsgn); // Fermion sign
197 
198  ierr = MPI_Sendrecv(&X->Check.idim_max, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, origin, 0,
199  &idim_max_buf, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, origin, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &statusMPI);
200  if (ierr != 0) exitMPI(-1);
201 
202  ierr = MPI_Sendrecv(tmp_v1, X->Check.idim_max + 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, origin, 0,
203  v1buf, idim_max_buf + 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, origin, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &statusMPI);
204  if (ierr != 0) exitMPI(-1);
205 
206  /*
207  Index in the intra PE
208  */
209  mask1 = X->Def.Tpow[2 * org_isite1 + org_ispin1];
210 
211  if (state2 == mask2) {
212  trans = -(double) Fsgn * tmp_trans;
213  state1check = 0;
214  }
215  else if (state2 == 0) {
216  state1check = mask1;
217  trans = -(double) Fsgn * conj(tmp_trans);
218  if (X->Large.mode == M_CORR) {
219  trans = 0;
220  }
221 
222  }
223  else return 0;
224 
225  bit1diff = X->Def.Tpow[2 * X->Def.Nsite - 1] * 2 - mask1 * 2;
226 
227  dam_pr = 0.0;
228  if (X->Large.mode == M_MLTPLY) {
229 #pragma omp parallel for default(none) reduction(+:dam_pr) private(j, dmv, state1, Fsgn, ioff) \
230  firstprivate(idim_max_buf, trans, X, mask1, state1check, bit1diff) shared(v1buf, tmp_v1, tmp_v0)
231  for (j = 0; j < idim_max_buf; j++) {
232 
233  state1 = j & mask1;
234 
235  if (state1 == state1check) {
236 
237  SgnBit(j & bit1diff, &Fsgn);
238  ioff = j ^ mask1;
239 
240  dmv = (double) Fsgn * trans * v1buf[j + 1];
241  tmp_v0[ioff + 1] += dmv;
242  dam_pr += conj(tmp_v1[ioff + 1]) * dmv;
243  }
244  }
245 
246  }
247  else {
248 #pragma omp parallel for default(none) reduction(+:dam_pr) private(j, dmv, state1, Fsgn, ioff) \
249  firstprivate(idim_max_buf, trans, X, mask1, state1check, bit1diff) shared(v1buf, tmp_v1, tmp_v0)
250  for (j = 0; j < idim_max_buf; j++) {
251 
252  state1 = j & mask1;
253 
254  if (state1 == state1check) {
255 
256  SgnBit(j & bit1diff, &Fsgn);
257  ioff = j ^ mask1;
258 
259  dmv = (double) Fsgn * trans * v1buf[j + 1];
260  dam_pr += conj(tmp_v1[ioff + 1]) * dmv;
261  }
262  }
263  }
264  return (dam_pr);
265 #endif
266 }/*void GC_child_general_hopp_MPIsingle*/
